name: Solitaire New Classic
description:
Play the best Solitaire card game on iOS!

Classic Solitaire is the most popular solitaire card game in the world. Try our best Solitaire card app, which is beautiful and fun like classic Windows Solitaire.

Features of Solitaire :
- Beautiful graphics
- Big Letters, easy to read cards
- Customise, set card style, back of card and background from your own pictures
- Gamecenter, show your high score with your friends
- Unlimited free undo, no penalty undo
- Stress free, no time counter, relax and just play.
- Fast gameplay, single tap card to place automatically
- Autocomplete, finish the game for you.
- Tablet support

If you like playing solitaire, this is the app for you!
What are you waiting for? This simple gem is the ultimate solitaire challenge - play Solitaire now on iOS!
